thread.title: Montana Dave
thread.title_full: KT Performance reviewed by Montana Dave

author: Montana Dave
title: Montana Dave
text: We bought a Biker Bar for our enclosed trailer to haul our Harley and we are so very pleased with our purchase. It is made in the USA and is super heavy duty, we are very satisfied.. We will definitely put out a great word for the Biker Bar and KT Performance. Thanks so much!!!! Great delivery time as well. Dave in Montana.
